Issue.summary: Implement a new unjoin command to unjoin a peer from the channel
Issue.description: * Implement a new peer command (peer node unjoin) to unjoin the peer from the channel. The command takes a -channel parameter and will delete all the channel-specific data stored on the ledger. The channel-specific data includes blocks and data entries in stateleveldb, statecouchdb (drop databases), confighistorydb, bookkeepingdb, historydb, blockindex, ledger idStore.
